bibl.title: Dougherty v. Banta. Judge Response to Petition
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: United States District Court For The Western District of Washington Northern Division

div1.p: which it appears to me that a writ of Habeas Corpus ought to issue.

Als-98 ordered that a writ of habeas corpus issue out of and under the seal of the District Prunt of the 3d Judicial District of Washington Territory holding terms at Stilaerum for Pierce County decided to D.W.C. Dawsson commanding him to hence the Audy of the said John Dougherty me, in the court room of the said Court in the 11th day of March 1874 at one of that day to do and receive what shall then and there be considered concerning the said John Dougherty with the time and cause of his detention and that he hence then and there the said writ.
, the District Court Judicial District holding for Pierce County
Application for a writ of Habeas Corpus
To To Wil To Select Mar 7th 1874 Glen Salem File Clerk
